attributes.action: make Mr. Thorpe stay at Queen Mary's Grammar School Walsall to teach Physics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition for those who believe Mr. Thorpe should not leave Queen Mary's as S8 is where he belongs. He has made his home there in the last year and has quicly risen through the teacher rankings. Sign if you wish to show him your support for him staying

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
